name: Academic CV/Resume in Notion template
description: Who should use this CV template?If you are a teacher/lecturer who spends most of your time in class and researching, this template will save a lot of hassle. Who am I?I am a marketer turned lecturer. I teach business management to MBA and undergraduates. After spending 2 years procrastinating, I have finally started my journey as a notion creator.Why did I create this template?I started my notion journey in 2021 and since then I have been searching for a simple yet effective academic CV template
